Frequently Asked Question

How long does Coverstick fragrance last on skin?

The Coverstick fragrance offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The unique formulation featuring vanilla and amber in the base notes creates a lingering scent that evolves beautifully throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin and consider layering with matching body products.
